data.title: main@groups.jewishgen.org
data.text:
Raymond Danker

Hi,

My name is Raymond DANKER & I would like get more info on my surname.

I live in Malaysia & have docs of my family up to 4 generation over

here. There are many Danker in Malaysia especially in the Portuguese

Settlement. According to your website there are many Danker surname

found especially in eastern Europe.

I would really like to know if Danker are of Jewish decedents.

I look forward to receiving some good news soon.

Raymond Danker

Melaka

Malaysia

The DANKERs in Ireland are Jewish with ancestors >from Dvinsk (aka

Daugapils and Dunaberg in Latvia. Zavel Danker moved to take a

position as Postmaster of Dankere (also called Gostini and Glazmanka)

, hence the surname in this instance. Conditions in Dankere were

difficult for Jews in the 1880s and the family emigrated to England

and later some of them came to Ireland. Information >from Annette

Danker Steiner who did much research on her family background.

I have also come across a Danker family in the US who arent Jewish and

are not aware of any Jewish ancestry, only German ancestry. The

surname can have various origins. (It sounds Dutch to me)

Philippa Robinson
